avalancheActivity.highlights: Ongoing SW snowshowers and strong winds have created windslabs widely in NW-SE facing hills. Snow will be added in strong N wind on Tuesday. Older snow is considered rather stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: SW winds and snowshowers dominated last week. It got warm high in the mountains with rain early on Friday and snow melted and subsided widely then more snow was added in SW wind. A snowprofile was taken in Bláfjöll the 5th of Feb. in a NW facing aspect, revealing cold windbroken snow on top of hardpacked isothermal snow. An ice layer was between the isothermal snow and the cold windbroken snow. A rather high temperature gradient was in the top layers. Stability test showed no response. Snow will be added in strong N wind on Tuesday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers last week and resently N snowfall or snowshowers this week. Unstable windslabs can occure in different aspects, espesially in lows and gullies.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers and recently after N snowshowers.

weatherForecast.highlights: Norðan 10-18 m/s og dálítil él á þriðjudag. Norðlægar eða hægbreytilegar áttir og bjartviðri í vikunni. Áframhaldandi frost.

avalancheActivity.comment: Two avalanches fell on and right by the road Súðavíkurhlíð early on Saturday. Avalanches also fell in Súðavíkurhlíð on the evening of 30th of Jan and night before 1st of Feb. Many small avalanches released in the area after heavy snowfall and snowdrift on early Thursday 25th of Jan.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow thawed up to 600m height last week. On top, new wind slabs have formed, first in SW winds and then NE. Snowfall in strong northerly winds expected on Tuesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Recently, snow has been added and drifted in variable winds, mostly SW. Layered wind slabs can be expected in most aspects They may be unstable, especially the most recent snow. Now, most snow is in slopes facing north and east. However, in snowfall in northerly winds on Tuesday, snow should accumulate in southerly aspects. There is though still rather little snow in mountains for the season. Slab avalanches may release on Tuesday, but very large avalanches are not expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers last week and resently N snowfall or snowshowers this week. Unstable windslabs can occure in different aspects, espesially in lows and gullies.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers and recently after N snowshowers.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma á þriðjudag í allhvassri norðanátt, styttir upp að mestu og dregur úr vindi á miðvikudag. Úrkomulítið og hægur vindur í framhaldinu.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few slab avalanches were recorded early last weekend in various aspects.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs are in mountains, especially in N-E aspects after strong SW winds. Snowfall and snowdrift are forecasted in a NW wind on Tuesday and then NE. New wind slabs are expected to form on the lee sides and slab avalanches may release.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Wind slabs and cornices are present, especially on N-E aspects after SW winds lately. A few slab avalanches released early last weekend, in various aspects. Snowfall and snowdrift are forecasted in NW wind on Tuesday and then NE. New wind slabs are expected to form in lee sides and add to the instability.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers last week and resently N snowfall or snowshowers this week. Unstable windslabs can occure in different aspects, espesially in lows and gullies.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers and recently after N snowshowers.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma í allshvassri NV átt á þriðjudag, snýst í NA um kvöldið og éljar áfram. Styttir upp og lægir þegar líður á miðvikudag og herðir á frosti.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs high in mountains but old stable snow in lower part of mountains. Snow will be added on Tuesday in strong W then N wind and windslabs can form in easterly and southerly aspect, especially in gullies and lows.

snowpackStructure.highlights: High in mountains there is dry recent snow that has formed windslabs. In lower part of mountains snow has subsided and melted and is considered stable. Snow will be added on Tuesday in strong W then N wind and windslabs can form in easterly and southerly aspect, especially in gullies and lows.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers last week and resently N snowfall or snowshowers this week. Unstable windslabs can occure in different aspects, espesially in lows and gullies.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowshowers and recently after N snowshowers.

weatherForecast.highlights: Vaxandi V-átt á þriðjudag með éljum, færist í norðan átt seinnipartinn. Norðlæg átt og dálítil él á miðvikudag, hægbreytileg átt á fimmtudag.
